flightsim.simconnect.recv
Class RecvCloudState

java.lang.Object
  flightsim.simconnect.recv.RecvPacket
      flightsim.simconnect.recv.RecvCloudState

public class RecvCloudState
extends RecvPacket

Cloud state. Contains a bi-dimensionnal array of cloud state. The array is 64 x 64 and values are 0 for no cloud and 255 for maximum cloud

Author:
lc0277
